metadata.title: CVE-2019-10648 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Robocode through 1.9.3.5 allows remote attackers to cause external serviceinteraction (DNS), as demonstrated by a query for a unique subdomain namewithin an attacker-controlled DNS zone, because of a .openStream callwithin java.net.URL.

criterions.comment: robocode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
